value.name: Official: Cops Didn’t Hear Witnesses Yell Deaf Man ‘Can’t Hear’ As He Was Shot
value.description: Magdiel Sanchez, 35, wasn’t obeying the officers’ commands before one shot him with a gun and the other with a Taser on Tuesday night, police Capt. Bo Mathews said at a news conference.

value.name: Deaf man shot 5 times by Oklahoma officer, autopsy shows
value.description: The autopsy, released Thursday, also shows that a stun gun was used on Magdiel Sanchez, who was fatally shot Sept. 19 outside of his home. Police have said officers who responded to a hit-and-run ...
